sip_features.sip_feature:
HTML

RTL Updates:

HSDs:
1. 1405442141 "FWD (PCR) ACE VISA - Requesting SBR visa insertion at SoC level instead of pre-insert at IP level" Sideband Router ACE files are now configured to generate Visa inserted RTL. Customers will need to run ACE visa executables in the $IP_ROOT/tools directory. The VISA inserted RTL and the test log files can be found in $IP_ROOT/GenRTL folders.
2. 1405328887 "TFM: SBR HDK SAGE for p1273" Sideband Router currently supports HDK based SAGE runs.
3. 1405328889 "TFM: SBR HDK SGDFT for p1273" SGDFT tool can be run on Sideband Router.
4. 1208256790 "FWD (PCR) SBR 98% stuck-at and 90% at-speed scan coverage " Sideband Router currently meets the TGL requirement of 99% scan coverage. Current SBR stuckat is 99.36% and atspeed is 98.5%.
5. 1204688320 "FWD (PCR) Support input flops with Chassis power management " SBR supports the input flops feature with Chassis power management on configs with PGCB enabled.
6. 1405497100 "SBR upf file needs to change the instance name for xbar configurations" Fixed the UPF files for xbar configurations.
7. 1405289168 "FWD (PCR) IOSF SBR LTE (transparent bridge - router) " Implemented the SBR LTE feature. Mulitcast validation is still WIP.

Backend Updates:

General Updates:

Validation Updates:

General Updates:

sip_knissues.sip_knissue:
HTML
"SVC does not scale for fabrics with more than 100 nodes"

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable CTECH library when synthesising the IP.

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable/behavior CTECH library when simulating the IP.

sip_specins.sip_specin:
HTML

This SBR release uses the "IOSF_SVC_2016WW42" version of SVC in IRR with constraints on hierarchical headers insertion.

For support file an HSD at https://hsdes.intel.com/appstore/article/#/sip.bugeco/create?=&subject=bugeco&tenant=sip

The first endpoint release with support for parity pins is IOSF_Sideband_Endpoint_ALL_2014WW31_R1p0_v5.

The Zircon scores are uploaded to the IPDS dashboard for the SBR IP at https://zircon.fm.intel.com/zircon/zircon/zirconReleaseDashboardTable.php?top_filter_checkbox=0&Proj_id=all&IP_id=17319&milestone_filter=4&Ver_id=all&App_id=all&showlatest=0
